item.title: I-84 East - Exit 33
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 33 - ID-55 South/Karcher Road/Midland Blvd.

item.title: I-84/US-30 East/ID-55 North - Nampa
item.description: I-84/US-30 East/ID-55 North in Nampa

item.title: ID-55 North - Canyon County/Snake River
item.description: ID-55 north crossing the Snake River and entering Canyon County.

item.title: End ID-78 at ID-55
item.description: End ID-78 at ID-55 in Marsing. Turn right for ID-55 north to Nampa and Boise. Turn left for ID-55 south to Winnemucca (Nevada).

item.title: End ID-78 West at ID-55
item.description: End ID-78 West at ID-55 in Marsing.

item.title: ID-78 West Approaching ID-55
item.description: ID-78 West approaching ID-55 in Marsing.

item.title: End ID-78 at ID-55
item.description: End ID-78 at ID-55 in Marsing. Turn right for ID-55 north to Nampa and Boise. Turn left for ID-55 south to Winnemucca (Nevada).

item.title: ID-55 North at ID-78
item.description: ID-55 north at ID-78 junction to Grandview and Bruneau. Continue north on ID-55 to Nampa and Boise. Milepost 2.

item.title: ID-55 North - Givens Hot Springs
item.description: ID-55 north approaching ID-78 junction in Marsing. Use ID-78 south for Givens (Hot) Springs.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 33
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 33 - ID-55 South/Nampa/Marsing. ID-55 leaves I-84 westbound here. This interchange has recently been reconfigured westbound, removing the 33A ramp, and renumbering the interchange to 33.

item.title: ID-55 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-55 south. Distance to Smith Ferry, Banks, and Boise.

item.title: ID-55 South - Warm Lake Road
item.description: ID-55 south at Warm Lake Road Jct to Warm Lake and Horsethief Reservoir.

item.title: ID-55 South - Cascade
item.description: Entering Cascade on ID-55 south. Speed Limit 50 MPH.

item.title: End BL-84 East at I-84/US-30/ID-55
item.description: End BL-84 East at I-84/US-30/ID-55 in Nampa. Merge right for I-84/US-30 East and ID-55 north to Meridian and Boise; continue under freeway for I-84/US-30 West and ID-55 south to Caldwell.

item.title: BL-84 East Approaching I-84/US-30/ID-55
item.description: BL-84 East approaching I-84/US-30/ID-55 (Exit 38) in Nampa. This is the east end of the Nampa business loop.

item.title: US-95 South Approaching ID-55
item.description: US-95 south approaching ID-55. Turn right to continue south on US-95 to Winnemucca (Nevada); straight for ID-55 north to Marsing and Nampa.

item.title: US-95 South Approaching ID-55
item.description: US-95 South approaching ID-55 near Marsing.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 33A
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 33A - ID-55 South/Karcher Center/Marsing/Winnemucca. ID-55 south leaves I-84 westbound.

item.title: I-84 West Onramp (Exit 44) at ID-69
item.description: I-84 West onramp at ID-69. Turn left for Bird of Prey Area and Dedication Point.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 44 Offramp
item.description: I-84 east Exit 44 offramp at ID-69 junction. Turn left for ID-69 south to Kuna.

item.title: I-84 West Approaching Exit 46
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 46 - ID-55 North/Eagle/McCall/Emmett. ID-55 joins I-84 westbound to Nampa.

item.title: End ID-69 North at I-84/US-30/ID-55
item.description: End ID-69 North at I-84/US-30/ID-55. Turn right for (I-84)/US-30 East/ID-55 north to Boise; left for (I-84)/US-30 West/ID-55 South to Nampa.

item.title: End ID-69 North at I-84/US-30/ID-55
item.description: End ID-69 north at I-84/US-30/ID-55 junction. Turn right for I-84 east; left for I-84 west. Continue north for (Meridian) City Center. This interchange was recently converted into a SPUI in 2016.

item.title: End ID-69 Approaching I-84
item.description: End ID-69 approaching I-84 in Meridian.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 46 Offramp
item.description: I-84 West - Exit 46 Offramp in Meridian. Turn right on ID-55 (Eagle Road) for Eagle, Emmett, and McCall. ID-55 south joins I-84 westbound to Nampa.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 38 Offramp
item.description: I-84 west Exit 38 offramp. Turn left for BL-84 towards Nampa and Murphy. Turn right for the Idaho Center, an event complex.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 44
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 44 - ID-69 South/Meridian/Kuna. This interchange was rebuilt in 2015 as a SPUI. The ID-69 shield in attached to the exit sign incorrectly has the state of Idaho filled in all black. Normally on these types of state highway shields on freeway junctions, the state is shown white with a black outline and black text.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 38
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 38 - BL-84/Garrity Blvd/Idaho Center Blvd. Use I-84 east for Meridian and Boise. This is the eastern end of the Nampa/Caldwell business loop.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 38
item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 38 - BL-84/Idaho Center Blvd./Garrity Blvd.

item.title: US-20/US-26 West at ID-55
item.description: US-20/US-26 west at ID-55 in Boise.

item.title: US-20/US-26 West Approaching ID-55
item.description: US-20/US-26 (Chinden Blvd.) West approaching ID-55 (Eagle Road) in Boise.

item.title: US-20/US-26 West at ID-55
item.description: US-20/US-26 West (Chinden Blvd.) at ID-55 (Eagle Road) in Boise. Turn right on ID-55 north for Eagle and McCall. Turn left for ID-55 south to Meridian. Continue west for US-20/US-26 to Caldwell.

item.title: ID-55 South at ID-44
item.description: ID-55 south at ID-44. ID-55 south joins ID-44 west through Eagle.

item.title: ID-55 South at ID-44
item.description: ID-55 south at ID-44. Use ID-44 west for Boise; use ID-44 East/ID-55 South for Eagle and Caldwell.

item.title: ID-55 South at ID-52
item.description: ID-55 south at ID-52 west to Emmett and Payette. Continue south on ID-55 for Boise.

item.title: ID-55 South Approaching ID-52
item.description: ID-55 south approaching ID-52 west in Horseshoe Bend.

item.title: ID-55 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-55 south. Distance to Horseshoe Bend and Boise.

item.title: End Banks-Lowman Highway at ID-55
item.description: End Banks-Lowman Highway at ID-55. Use ID-55 north for McCall; ID-55 south for Boise.

item.title: ID-55 South at US-20/US-26
item.description: ID-55 South (Eagle Road) at US-20/US-26. Turn right for US-20/US-26 west to Caldwell; left for US-20/US-26 east to Boise; straight for ID-55 south to Meridian.

item.title: ID-44 West at ID-55
item.description: ID-44 west at ID-55. Turn right for ID-55 south; continue straight for ID-55 north/ID-44 east. ID-55 joins ID-44 through Eagle.

item.title: ID-44 East at ID-55
item.description: ID-44 east (State St.) at ID-55. Turn right on ID-55 (Eagle Road) for Meridian. Turn left on Eagle Road for Eagle (downtown). Continue straight on ID-44/ID-55 for Boise. ID-55 follows ID-44 through Eagle.

item.title: ID-44 East Approaching ID-55
item.description: ID-44 east approaching ID-55 in Eagle.

item.title: End ID-69 North at I-84/US-30/ID-55
item.description: End ID-69 North at I-84/US-30/ID-55. Turn right for I-84/US-30 East/ID-55 north; continue over freeway for I-84/US-30 West/ID-55 South.

item.title: End ID-69 North at I-84/US-30/ID-55
item.description: End ID-69 north at I-84/US-30/ID-55 junction. Turn right for I-84/US-30 East/ID-55 north towards Boise; continue over freeway for I-84/US-30 West/ID-55 South towards Nampa. Meridian Road continues north into Meridian.

item.title: End ID-69 North Approaching I-84
item.description: End ID-69 north approaching I-84 in Meridian.

item.title: ID-69 South at I-84 East
item.description: ID-69 south at I-84 east towards Boise. Continue south on ID-69 for Kuna.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 44 Offramp
item.description: I-84 east Exit 44 offramp at ID-69 junction. Turn left for ID-69 south to Kuna; turn right for Meridian Road to Meridian (City Center).

item.title: I-84 West - Meridian Exits
item.description: Meridian Exits on I-84 west: Eagle Road (ID-55), Meridian Road (ID-69), and Ten Mile Road.

item.title: I-84 East - Meridian Exits
item.description: Meridian exits on I-84 east. Approaching Ten Mile Road, ID-69, and ID-55 junction.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 38
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 38 - BL-84/Garrity Blvd/Idaho Center Blvd. Use I-84 east for Meridian and Boies. This is the eastern end of the Nampa/Caldwell business loop. This interchange was recently rebuilt as part of the widening of I-84 between Nampa and Boise.

item.title: ID-55 South at I-84/US-30
item.description: ID-55 south at I-84/US-30 junction (Exit 33). Turn right for I-84/US-30 East/ID-55 south to Boise. Turn left for I-84/US-30 west to Caldwell and Ontario (Oregon). Continue ahead for Midland Blvd. ID-55 joins I-84 east to Meridian.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 42
item.description: I-84 East at Exit 42 - Ten Mile Road. This is the newest interchange along I-84 in Idaho. It was completed in May of 2011.

item.title: I-84 East Approaching Exit 42
item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 42 - Ten Mile Road.

item.title: Begin BL-84 West at I-84 Exit 38 Onramp
item.description: Begin BL-84 West (Garrity Blvd.) at I-84/US-30/ID-55 onramp at Exit 38. Use I-84/US-30 East/ID-55 north for Boise. Continue on BL-84 west for Nampa and Murphy.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 38 Offramp
item.description: I-84 west Exit 38 offramp. Turn left for BL-84 towards Nampa and Murphy. Turn right for the Idaho Center, an event complex.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 38
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 38 - BL-84/Garrity Blvd./Idaho Center Blvd. I-84 heads west towards Caldwell and Ontario (Oregon). Oddly, there are two different control cities for two different sets of lanes. Through Nampa, all through traffic is urged to use the left lanes, so it does not make since why Ontario bound traffic use the left most lane.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 38
item.description: I-84/US-30 west at Exit 38 - BL-84/Garrity Blvd./Idaho Center Blvd. Westbound I-84 traffic continues towards Caldwell and Ontario (OR).

item.title: ID-55 North at BL-84
item.description: ID-55 north at BL-84 (Nampa-Caldwell Blvd.). Continue north on ID-55 for I-84.

item.title: ID-55 North at Canyon County Line
item.description: ID-55 north crossing the Snake River and entering Canyon County.

item.title: ID-55 North at ID-78
item.description: ID-55 north at ID-78 junction to Grand View and Brueau in Marsing.

item.title: ID-55 North Approaching ID-78
item.description: ID-55 north approaching ID-78 junction in Marsing.

item.title: US-95 North Approaching ID-55
item.description: US-95 north approaching ID-55.

item.title: I-84 East - Meridian Exits
item.description: Meridian exits on I-84 east. Approaching ID-69, and ID-55 junction.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 38
item.description: I-84/US-30 west at Exit 38 - BL-84/Garrity Blvd./Idaho Center Blvd. Westbound I-84 traffic continues towards Caldwell and Ontario (OR).

item.title: I-84 West Approaching Exit 38
item.description: I-84/US-30 west approaching Exit 38 - BL-84/Garrity Blvd./Idaho Center Blvd. Westbound I-84 traffic continues towards Caldwell and Ontario (OR). This is a new sign as part of the I-84 widening between Meridian and Nampa.

item.title: ID-55 South at I-84
item.description: ID-55 south at I-84. Use I-84/ID-55 west for Meridian. Use I-84 east for Boise. ID-55 joins I-84 west to Nampa.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 33A
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 33A - ID-55 South/Karcher Center/Marsing/Winnemucca. ID-55 south leaves I-84 westbound.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 33B
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 338 - Midland Blvd./Market Place Blvd.

item.title: I-84 East Exit 38
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 38 - BL-84/Idaho Center Blvd./Garrity Blvd./Murphy

item.title: I-84 East Approaching Exit 38
item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 38 - BL-84/Idaho Center Blvd./Garrity Blvd./Nampa

item.title: I-84 East Exit 36
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 36 - N. Franklin Blvd./Murphy. The exit text was changed in 2007 from Franklin Blvd.

item.title: ID-55 North at I-84
item.description: ID-55 east at I-84. Take I-84 west to Caldwell and Ontario. I-84 east towards Boise. ID-55 joins I-84 east to Meridian. This is a new interchange, completed in 2007. Before this, all ID-55 traffic was routed through downtown Nampa to get to the interstate.

item.title: ID-55 South - Payette River Scenic Byway
item.description: Payette River Scenic Byway/ID-55 on ID-55 South. This sign is the newer style of scenic byway signs.

item.title: US-95 South at ID-55
item.description: US-95 South at ID-55. Although fastest way to Boise is via ID-55 - sign directs Boise traffic on US-95. US-95 south is the fastest way to I-84.

item.title: End ID-55 North at US-95
item.description: End ID-55 at US-95 south to Council, and north to Grangeville and Lewiston.

item.title: End ID-55 North at US-95
item.description: End ID-55 north at US-95. US-95 between New Meadows and Grangeville is the only highway connecting north and south Idaho.

item.title: ID-55 North At US-95
item.description: ID-55 north approaching US-95.

item.title: ID-55 North At ID-52
item.description: ID-55 north at ID-52 west to Emmett.

item.title: ID-55 North Approaching ID-52
item.description: ID-55 north approaching ID-52.

item.title: ID-44 West At ID-55
item.description: ID-44 west at ID-55.

item.title: ID-44 West Approaching ID-55
item.description: ID-44 west at ID-55 north junction. ID-55 follows ID-44 west through Eagle. ID-55 northward is the Payette River Scenic Byway.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 35 Approaching Exit 36
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 35 - Northside Blvd. Approaching Exit 36 - N Franklin Blvd.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 36 Approaching Exit 35
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 36 - N. Franklin Blvd. Approaching Exit 35 - Northside Blvd.

item.title: I-84 East Exit 33
item.description: I-84 east at newly opened Exit 33, ID-55 South/Nampa/Marsing.

item.title: US-20/US-26 West at ID-55
item.description: US-20/US-26 west at ID-55.

item.title: Farmway Road South at ID-55
item.description: Farmway Road at ID-55. ID-55 shield is all white instead of solid black for the upper right portion.

item.title: ID-55 South - Owyhee County Line
item.description: ID-55 south at Snake River/Owyhee county line.

item.title: ID-55 South Approaching ID-78
item.description: ID-55 south approaching ID-78.

item.title: ID-55 South at ID-78
item.description: ID-55 south at ID-78 east to Grand View and Bruneau. ID-78 follows the south side of the Snake River to Hammett.

item.title: End ID-69 North at I-84/US-30/ID-55
item.description: End ID-69 north at I-84/US-30/ID-55 (Exit 44). Use I-84/US-30 East/ID-55 North to Boise; Use I-84/US-30 West/ID-55 South to Nampa. Continue north for Meridian Road into downtown Meridian.

item.title: ID-55 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-55 north in Marsing. Distance to Marsing, Nampa, and Boise.

item.title: ID-55 North at ID-78
item.description: ID-55 north approaching ID-78 junction in Marsing.

item.title: ID-55 North at ID-78 West
item.description: ID-55 north at ID-78 junction to Grand View and Brueau in Marsing.

item.title: US-95 South Approaching ID-55
item.description: US-95 south approaching ID-55. Turn right to continue south on US-95 to Winnemucca (Nevada); straight for ID-55 north to Marsing and Nampa.

item.title: I-84 East Exit 35
item.description: I-84 East at Exit 35 - ID-55/Nampa Blvd./Marsing. The ID-55 interchange has since been relocated to Exit 33. The current interchange is signed as Northside Blvd.

item.title: I-84 East Exit 38
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 38 - BL-84/Garrity Blvd. This is the eastern end of the Nampa/Caldwell business loop.

item.title: I-84 East Exits 35 and Exit 36
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 35 - ID-55/Nampa Blvd./Marsing and Exit 36 - Franklin Blvd. ID-55 has since been relocated to Exit 33. The new exit text for Exit 35 is Northside Blvd. Exit 36 is now Franklin Blvd./Murphy

item.title: ID-44 West at ID-55 North
item.description: ID-44/ID-55 Junction in Eagle. ID-55 is one of the two main routes from southern Idaho to northern Idaho.

item.title: End Banks-Lowman Hwy. at ID-55
item.description: ID-55 Junction at Banks-Lowman Road in Banks

item.title: US-95 North at ID-55
item.description: US-95 north at ID-55 near Marsing. Turn right for ID-55 north to Boise. Turn left for US-95 north to Homedale and Payette.

item.title: US-95 South at ID-55
item.description: US-95 south at ID-55 junction near Glenns Ferry.

item.title: ID-55 South - Payette River Scenic Byway
item.description: Payette River Scenic Byway on ID-55 south.

item.title: US-95 South at ID-55
item.description: US-95/ID-55 Junction to Boise and Weiser, US-95 South. A newer version of this sign directs Boise traffic to the right towards Weiser.

item.title: US-95 South at ID-55
item.description: ID-55 Junction on US-95 South.
